title: Escape to Fiji
text:
Local Real Estate Cars For Sale 
Looking to escape winter? Keen to get away from the freezing weather? How about a luxury resort in Fiji? 
Likuliku Lagoon Resort is one of my favourite getaways close to home. It's a tropical paradise for adults only and a romantic spot in the South Pacific. 
The resort (along with its sister resort Malolo Island Resort) is owned by a Fijian family company, so one of the hallmarks of is the warm and friendly service. Likuliku is best-known for its romantic overwater bungalows, which are sure to impress. And if you're really looking for the royal treatment, book a helicopter transfer.
